name: Untitled Dice Game (RevanousHydra, Kyro Studios)
description:
Fight your way against multiple enemies using your dice to empower attacks, weaken the enemy, or invest in new shiny dice.

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2022

Theme is Roll of the Dice

Made by Iliya Galich & Town.

Credits

Programming by Iliya Galich

Main theme by Andrea Baroni
